title: Understanding Encryption
text: Encryption is a method used to protect sensitive information by converting it into a code. This ensures that only authorized parties can access the data.

hintAnswer: by converting data into a code to prevent unauthorized access
title: How Encryption Works
text: Encryption protects sensitive information by converting data into a code to prevent unauthorized access.
choices: by converting data into a code to prevent unauthorized access
by making data visible to everyone
